PERSONA:
jim is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. he has some college education but no degree. jim was born in the u.s. and is a citizen. he identifies as an atheist and is unaffiliated with any religion, never attending religious services.

politically, jim considers himself an independent but leans towards the democratic party. his ideology is moderate to conservative. he is a registered voter and earns a middle-class income between $80,000 and $90,000 per year.

jim is an active internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he is not involved in any volunteer work. overall, he leads a comfortable life in his metropolitan area, enjoying his retirement years with his spouse and maintaining his moderate political and ideological views.
